improvement_list.improvement_desc: The function returns 0.0 when the exponent is 0. This is incorrect; it should return 1.0.  Any number raised to the power of 0 is 1.
Add a check to handle the case where the exponent is negative to avoid potential issues.
The testcase (10.0, 0, 1.0) is incorrect. 10.0 raised to the power of 0 is 1.0, not 0.0. Update the expected value to 1.0
